title.narrative: North Karnataka Urban Sector Investment Program - Project 4

description.narrative: Project 4 under the Investment Program (the Project) supports improvements in sanitation, water supply and municipal infrastructure in the following 14 ULBs: Basavakalyan, Badami, Bellary, Bidar, Gadag-Betegeri, Gokak, Haveri, Hospet, Ilkal, Nippani, Raichur, Shahabad, Sindhanur and Yadgir and institutional development, improved municipal management and project implementation capacity for the Investment Program ULBs.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Mainstreaming 24/7 PBMC in the water delivery (baseline = 0; target = 12 ULBs)

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka

title.narrative: Household coverage of improved sewerage (from 20% in 2013 to 60% in 2017 on average) for 3 target ULBs, to include poor and FHHs

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka

title.narrative: Supply volume per capita per day increased (Target: 100 lpcd, from average 60 lpcd in 2013)

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka

title.narrative: Household coverage for improved water supply (from 64% average in 2013 to 91% in 2017 on average) for 12 target ULBs, to include poor and FHHs

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka

title.narrative: Sewerage discharge meets KSPCB standards (baseline: non-compliant)

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka

title.narrative: Water supplied to GOI water quality standards (baseline: non-compliant)

description.narrative: Improved urban service delivery in 14 ULBs in North Karnataka
